snippet.title: Lips Breaker:An arkanoid game that can be played with your face!
snippet.description:
The game is coming soon, everyone join the wish list!(੭ˊᵕˋ)੭
steam url(Lips Breaker):
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3126660/_/

This is an arkanoid game that can be played with your face!
The game was the first brick game to introduce face control technology. As a player, you need to flexibly shake your mouth in front of the camera to control the baffle to bounce the ball, smash all the bricks to win, and play in a new and interesting way. This game contains colorful props, bricks and a variety of biological bosses, but also through facial expressions to control the level of various organs.
Face control games are fun, and become the "mouth king" in the field of brick games.
